about_the_game:
Reclaim Her Face with the Camera!

A mysterious game where you find yourself in an unknown room with a faceless woman who has lost her memories. Skillfully manipulate objects, arrange them to resemble a face, and capture the scene with your camera to restore parts of her face!

Bring back her full face and escape this enigmatic space!

Note: This game includes some horror elements. Please proceed with caution.

About This Game

This escape game is a collaboration between "Shinise," a university YouTuber known for hits like "Nibansen" , "Sanbansen" , and "Platform 4", and two up-and-coming student horror game creators who have showcased their work at indie game events. Discover hidden patterns, use the camera wisely, and make your way to freedom!

The game offers a mix of Japanese-style horror, puzzles, and escape elements. We hope you enjoy this unique experience!

Gameplay Guidelines

We want as many people as possible to discover, play, and enjoy our games! All titles by MFC STUDIO are free to stream or record for videos.

If you encounter any issues regarding streaming or videos, feel free to contact us on X (formerly Twitter) at @Shinise3.

Estimated Playtime

30 minutes to 2 hours

Video and Streaming Guidelines

  • Streaming and video uploads are allowed for individuals and organizations without prior approval.

  • Monetization is permitted.

  • If possible, we’d appreciate it if you include the game’s title in your video or stream title and add a link to this Steam page in the description.

Developers

Shinise – Manager
Naoki – Planner & Programmer
Fukaryo – Designer & 3D Modeler

All team members are students.

name: KAONI-カメラで顔を取り戻せ-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ x64
  • Processor: Intel/AMD X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

short_description: Reclaim Her Face with the Camera! A mysterious escape game where you’re trapped with a faceless woman. Arrange objects into a face, snap a photo, and restore her features to escape the room! Note: This game includes some horror elements. Please proceed with caution.
